name: The Joke -> You
description:
We were given three random words to choose from. These were: Lido, Vitamins and joke. 

We chose joke! The idea is simple, you must jump and catch the jokes before they go over your head! Inspired by the meme.

We thought as mostly programmers, the best way to complete this was to write a main script each plus a few smaller ones. We were successful! You'll find this game to be basic but playable.

Credits:

Olly :- Programmed our scoring system

Jack :- Programmed playable character

Lewis :- Programmed the joke

Robin :- Created art and animations

Nik :- Programmed our UI

Ed :- Programmed collision
